verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David.) I waited <S%H6960><s%> patiently <S%H6960><s%> for the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> And He inclined <S%H5186><s%> to me, and heard <S%H8085><s%> my cry. <S%H7775><s%>

He brought <S%H5927><s%> me up out of the pit <S%H953><s%> of destruction, <S%H7588><s%> out of the miry <S%H3121><s%> clay; <S%H2916><s%> And He set <S%H6965><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> upon a rock <S%H5553><s%> making <S%H3559><s%> my footsteps <S%H9036><s%> firm. <S%H3559><s%>

And He put <S%H5414><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> in my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> a song <S%H8416><s%> of praise <S%H8416><s%> to our God; <S%H430><s%> Many <S%H7227><s%> will see <S%H7200><s%> and fear, <S%H3372><s%> And will trust <S%H982><s%> in the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

How blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H1397><s%> who <S%H834><s%> has made <S%H7760><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> his trust, <S%H4009><s%> And has not turned <S%H6437><s%> to the proud, <S%H7295><s%> nor to those who lapse <S%H7750><s%> into falsehood. <S%H3577><s%>

Many, <S%H7227><s%> O Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> are the wonders <S%H6381><s%> which Thou hast done, <S%H6213><s%> And Thy thoughts <S%H4284><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> us; There <S%H369><s%> is none <S%H369><s%> to compare <S%H6186><s%> with Thee; If I would declare <S%H5046><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> of them, They would be too <S%H4480><s%> numerous <S%H6105><s%> to count. <S%H5608><s%>

Sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> and meal <S%H4503><s%> offering <S%H4503><s%> Thou hast not desired; <S%H2654><s%> My ears <S%H241><s%> Thou hast opened; <S%H3738><s%> Burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> and sin <S%H2401><s%> offering <S%H2401><s%> Thou hast not required. <S%H7592><s%>
Then <S%H227><s%> I said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I come; <S%H935><s%> In the scroll <S%H4039><s%> of the book <S%H5612><s%> it is written <S%H3789><s%> of me;
I delight <S%H2654><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> Thy will, <S%H7522><s%> O my God; <S%H430><s%> Thy Law <S%H8451><s%> is within <S%H8432><s%> my heart. <S%H4578><s%> "

I have proclaimed <S%H1319><s%> glad <S%H1319><s%> tidings <S%H1319><s%> of righteousness <S%H6664><s%> in the great <S%H7227><s%> congregation; <S%H6951><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will not restrain <S%H3607><s%> my lips, <S%H8193><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Thou knowest. <S%H3045><s%>

I have not hidden <S%H3680><s%> Thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> my heart; <S%H3820><s%> I have spoken <S%H559><s%> of Thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%> and Thy salvation; <S%H8668><s%> I have not concealed <S%H3582><s%> Thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and Thy truth <S%H571><s%> from the great <S%H7227><s%> congregation. <S%H6951><s%>

Thou, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> wilt not withhold <S%H3607><s%> Thy compassion <S%H7356><s%> from me; Thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and Thy truth <S%H571><s%> will continually <S%H8548><s%> preserve <S%H5341><s%> me.

For evils <S%H9567><s%> beyond <S%H5704><s%> <S%H369><s%> number <S%H4557><s%> have surrounded <S%H661><s%> me; My iniquities <S%H5771><s%> have overtaken <S%H5381><s%> me, so that I am not able <S%H3201><s%> to see; <S%H7200><s%> They are more <S%H4480><s%> numerous <S%H6105><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the hairs <S%H8185><s%> of my head; <S%H7218><s%> And my heart <S%H3820><s%> has failed <S%H5800><s%> me.
Be pleased, <S%H7521><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> me; Make <S%H2363><s%> haste, <S%H2363><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> to help <S%H5833><s%> me.

Let those be ashamed <S%H954><s%> and humiliated <S%H3637><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> Who seek <S%H1245><s%> my life <S%H5315><s%> to destroy <S%H5595><s%> it; Let those be turned <S%H5472><s%> back <S%H268><s%> and dishonored <S%H3637><s%> Who <S%H2655><s%> delight <S%H2655><s%> in my hurt. <S%H9567><s%>
Let those be appalled <S%H8074><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6118><s%> of their shame <S%H1322><s%> Who say <S%H559><s%> to me, "Aha, <S%H1889><s%> aha! <S%H1889><s%>"

Let all <S%H3605><s%> who seek <S%H1245><s%> Thee rejoice <S%H7797><s%> and be glad <S%H8055><s%> in Thee; Let those who love <S%H157><s%> Thy salvation <S%H8668><s%> say <S%H559><s%> continually, <S%H8548><s%> "The Lord <S%H3068><s%> be magnified! <S%H1431><s%>"

Since I am afflicted <S%H6041><s%> and needy, <S%H34><s%> Let the Lord <S%H136><s%> be mindful <S%H2803><s%> of me; Thou art my help <S%H5833><s%> and my deliverer; <S%H6403><s%> Do not delay, <S%H309><s%> O my God. <S%H430><s%>
